text: Family and friends continue to mourn over the loss of Kate Spade. More than a month after the fashion designer was found dead after an apparent suicide, David Spade speaks and shares positive memories of his beloved sister - in - law Good morning in the morning, the comedian became serious when he revealed that the family ` ` copes as well as possible''. ` ` It was obviously very difficult and it's very nice that everyone came out of the woodwork, it really made an impression.'' David told Robin Roberts. ` ` I remember when we were running around, every girl I was with or someone who knew they would see Katie dressing differently, they would bring their A - game, it was very cute.'' He continued, ` ` Katie was very sweet, she would know that they do that
